description.p: This ballot package contains a module package that contains a set of application modules to record:

ul.li: individual activities with their whole-part, connection and involvement relationships;
a library of classes of activity with their whole-part, connection and involvement relationships;
the classification of an individual activity as a member of a class of activity, and the classification of a relationship between individual activities as a member of a class of relationship; and
the specification of the complete membership for a class of activity or a class of relationship between activities.
